item.title: Bsdiff
item.description: 1 引言 bsdiff and bspatch are tools for building and applying patches to binary files. By using suffix > sorting (specifically, Larsson and Sadakane’s qsufsort) and taking advantage of how executable files change, bsdiff routinely produces binary patches 50-80% smaller than those produced by Xdelta, and 15% smaller than those produced by .RTPatch (a $2750/seat commercial patch tool) – 直接摘抄自官网 详情可
